snippet: The Mets’ day took a sour turn even before their first loss of the season when they learned that David Wright had sustained a small fracture to the pinkie on his right hand.
abstract: Washington Nationals defeat New York Mets, 6-2, to hand Mets their first loss of the season; Mets third baseman David Wright, who sustained hand injury in previous game, is scratched from lineup.
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ day took a sour turn even before their first loss of the season when they learned that David Wright had sustained a small fracture to the pinkie on his right hand.

headline.seo: Mets Lose Wright, Then Their First Game of the Season
headline.main: Mets Lose Wright and Then Their First Game
headline.print_headline: Mets Lose Wright and Then Their First Game
